member.name: T:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject
member.summary:
Class to receive the return from the api-call to https://www.geojs.io/. Created by Erik Nagel and Bard (Gemini) on 04.03.2024.
04.03.2024 Erik Nagel: erstellt
member.remarks: This class corresponds to the following JSON structure: ```json { "country_code": "DE", "country_code3": "DEU", "continent_code": "EU", "region": "North Rhine-Westphalia", "latitude": "51.2402", "longitude": "6.7785", "accuracy": 5, "country": "Germany", "timezone": "Europe/Berlin", "city": "Düsseldorf", "organization": "AS3320 Deutsche Telekom AG", "asn": 3320, "ip": "87.146.129.31", "area_code": "0", "organization_name": "Deutsche Telekom AG" } ```

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.CountryCode
member.summary: Two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.CountryCode3
member.summary: Three-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.ContinentCode
member.summary: Continent code.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Region
member.summary: Region or state name.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude coordinate.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude coordinate.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Accuracy
member.summary: Reported accuracy of the location data.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Country
member.summary: Full country name.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Timezone
member.summary: Time zone identifier.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.City
member.summary: City name.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Organization
member.summary: Organization name associated with the IP address.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Asn
member.summary: Autonomous System Number (ASN) associated with the IP address.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.Ip
member.summary: IP address used for the geolocation lookup.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.AreaCode
member.summary: Area code associated with the IP address (may not be available).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.GeoLocation_geojs_ReturnObject.OrganizationName
member.summary: Full organization name associated with the IP address (may differ from Organization).

member.name: T:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker
member.summary: DemoChecker-Projekt für Vishnu. Die WeatherChecker.dll kann später in einer Vishnu-JobDescription.xml referenziert werden und von Vishnu bei der Ausführung des Jobs aus dem Plugin-Unterverzeichnis oder einem konfigurierten UserAssemblyDirectory dynamisch geladen werden. Vishnu ruft dann je nach weiteren Konfigurationen (Trigger) die öffentliche Methode "Run" des UserCheckers auf.
member.remarks:
Autor: Erik Nagel
The weather forecasts come from https://open-meteo.com. Thanks to the team. Further I want to thank the developer-team who runs http://ip-api.com/ which provides a geolocation service, that is free for non commercial usage.
(The weather forecasts formerly came from https://www.7timer.info. Many thanks to Chenzhou Cui and his friends, who runned this wonderful free weather-forecast site)
11.10.2020 Erik Nagel: erstellt 26.04.2024 Erik Nagel: auf open.meteo.com geaendert.

member.name: E:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker.NodeProgressChanged
member.summary: Kann aufgerufen werden, wenn sich der Verarbeitungsfortschritt des Checkers geändert hat, muss aber zumindest aber einmal zum Schluss der Verarbeitung aufgerufen werden.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker.ReturnObject
member.summary: Rückgabe-Objekt des Checkers

member.name: M:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker.Run(System.Object,Vishnu.Interchange.TreeParameters,Vishnu.Interchange.TreeEvent)
member.summary: Hier wird der Arbeitsprozess ausgeführt (oder beobachtet).
member.param: Ihre Aufrufparameter aus der JobDescription.xml oder null.
Für den gesamten Tree gültige Parameter oder null (z.Zt. unbenutzt).

member.param: False, wenn vom eigenen Destruktor aufgerufen.

member.summary: Finalizer: wird vom GarbageCollector aufgerufen.

member.summary: ReturnObject für das Ergebnis des WeatherCheckers.
member.remarks:
Autor: Erik Nagel, NetEti
12.10.2022 Erik Nagel: erstellt

member.name: T:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint
member.summary: Eine Wettervorhersage für einen bestimmten Zeitabschnitt.

member.name: T:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Wind
member.summary: Unterklasse: fasst Windrichtung und Windgeschwindigkeit zusammen.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Wind.Direction
member.summary: Windrichtung: N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Wind.Speed
member.summary: Windgeschwindigkeit: 1 unter 0.3m/s (ruhig) 2 0.3-3.4m/s (leicht) 3 3.4-8.0m/s (gemäßigt) 4 8.0-10.8m/s (frisch) 5 10.8-17.2m/s (stark) 6 17.2-24.5m/s (heftig) 7 24.5-32.6m/s (stürmisch) 8 über 32.6m/s (Orkan)

member.summary: Standard Konstruktor.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Timepoint
member.summary: Definiert den Aufsetz-Zeitpunkt.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Lifted_Index
member.summary: Stabilitätsindikator - je kleiner, desto instabiler ist die Wetterlage: -10 Below -7 -6 -7 to -5 -4 -5 to -3 -1 -3 to 0 2 0 to 4 6 4 to 8 10 8 to 11 15 Over 11

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Prec_Type
member.summary: Niederschlag: snow, rain, frzr (freezing rain), icep (ice pellets), none.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Prec_Amount
member.summary: Niederschlagsmenge: 0 None 1 0-0.25mm/hr 2 0.25-1mm/hr 3 1-4mm/hr 4 4-10mm/hr 5 10-16mm/hr 6 16-30mm/hr 7 30-50mm/hr 8 50-75mm/hr 9 Over 75mm/hr

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Temp2m
member.summary: Temperatur (in 2 m Höhe über dem Erdboden gemessen): -76 to 60: -76C to +60C.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Rh2m
member.summary: Relative Luftfeuchtigkeit (in 2 m Höhe über dem Erdboden gemessen): 0 to 100: 0% to 100%.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Wind10m
member.summary: Unterklasse: fasst Windrichtung und Windgeschwindigkeit zusammen.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_7Timer_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Weather
member.summary: Wetterbeschreibung: clearday, clearnight Total cloud cover less than 20% pcloudyday, pcloudynight Total cloud cover between 20%-60% mcloudyday, mcloudynight Total cloud cover between 60%-80% cloudyday, cloudynight Total cloud cover over over 80% humidday, humidnight Relative humidity over 90% with total cloud cover less than 60% lightrainday, lightrainnight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover more than 80% oshowerday, oshowernight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover between 60%-80% ishowerday, ishowernight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover less than 60% lightsnowday, lightsnownight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr rainday, rainnight Precipitation rate over 4mm/hr snowday, snownight Precipitation rate over 4mm/hr rainsnowday, rainsnownight Precipitation type to be ice pellets or freezing rain.

member.name: T:WeatherChecker.HourlyUnits
member.summary: This class defines the units used in the hourly data.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.HourlyUnits.Time
member.summary: The unit of time used for the timestamps in the hourly data (e.g., "ISO8601").

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.HourlyUnits.Temperature2m
member.summary: The unit of measurement for the 2-meter temperature data (e.g., "celsius").

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.HourlyUnits.RelativeHumidity2m
member.summary: The unit of measurement for the relative humidity at 2 meters data (e.g., "%").

member.summary: The unit of measurement for the weather code data.

member.summary: Standard constructor, necessary for json-deserialization.

member.name: T:WeatherChecker.Hourly
member.summary: This class represents the hourly weather data.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.Hourly.Time
member.summary: List of timestamps for each data point (same unit as specified in HourlyUnits.Time).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.Hourly.Temperature2m
member.summary: List of 2-meter temperature values in the specified unit (from HourlyUnits.Temperature2m).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.Hourly.RelativeHumidity2m
member.summary: List of relative humidity values at 2 meters (in the unit specified by HourlyUnits.RelativeHumidity2m).

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.Hourly.WeatherCode
member.summary: List of weather codes for each data point.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Prec_Type
member.summary: Niederschlag: snow, rain, frzr (freezing rain), icep (ice pellets), none.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Prec_Amount
member.summary: Niederschlagsmenge: 0 None 1 0-0.25mm/hr 2 0.25-1mm/hr 3 1-4mm/hr 4 4-10mm/hr 5 10-16mm/hr 6 16-30mm/hr 7 30-50mm/hr 8 50-75mm/hr 9 Over 75mm/hr

member.summary: Temperatur (in 2 m Höhe über dem Erdboden gemessen): -76 to 60: -76C to +60C.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Humidity
member.summary: Relative Luftfeuchtigkeit (in 2 m Höhe über dem Erdboden gemessen): 0 to 100: 0% to 100%.

member.summary: Unterklasse: fasst Windrichtung und Windgeschwindigkeit zusammen.

member.name: P:WeatherChecker.WeatherChecker_ReturnObject.ForecastDataPoint.Weather
member.summary: Wetterbeschreibung: clearday, clearnight Total cloud cover less than 20% pcloudyday, pcloudynight Total cloud cover between 20%-60% mcloudyday, mcloudynight Total cloud cover between 60%-80% cloudyday, cloudynight Total cloud cover over over 80% humidday, humidnight Relative humidity over 90% with total cloud cover less than 60% lightrainday, lightrainnight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover more than 80% oshowerday, oshowernight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover between 60%-80% ishowerday, ishowernight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr with total cloud cover less than 60% lightsnowday, lightsnownight Precipitation rate less than 4mm/hr rainday, rainnight Precipitation rate over 4mm/hr snowday, snownight Precipitation rate over 4mm/hr rainsnowday, rainsnownight Precipitation type to be ice pellets or freezing rain.
